verses.verse: Afterward he brought me again <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house; <S%H1004><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> issued out <S%H3318><s%> from under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> eastward: <S%H6921><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> stood toward the east, <S%H6921><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> from the right side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3802><s%> <S%H3233><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> at the south <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5045><s%> side of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then brought he me out <S%H3318><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and led me about <S%H5437><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the utter <S%H2351><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that looketh <S%H6437><s%> eastward; <S%H6921><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there ran out <S%H6379><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> on <S%H4480><s%> the right <S%H3233><s%> side. <S%H3802><s%>

And when the man <S%H376><s%> that had the line <S%H6957><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> eastward, <S%H6921><s%> he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and he brought <S%H5674><s%> me through the waters; <S%H4325><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were to the ankles. <S%H657><s%>

Again he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and brought <S%H5674><s%> me through the waters; <S%H4325><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were to the knees. <S%H1290><s%> Again he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and brought me through; the waters <S%H4325><s%> were to the loins. <S%H4975><s%>

Afterward he measured <S%H4058><s%> a thousand; <S%H505><s%> and it was a river <S%H5158><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> pass over: <S%H5674><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were risen, <S%H1342><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> to swim in, <S%H7813><s%> a river <S%H5158><s%> that <S%H834><s%> could not <S%H3808><s%> be passed over. <S%H5674><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> hast thou seen <S%H7200><s%> this? Then he brought <S%H1980><s%> me, and caused me to return <S%H7725><s%> to the brink <S%H8193><s%> of the river. <S%H5158><s%>

Now when I had returned, <S%H7725><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> on the one side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and on the other. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, These <S%H428><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> issue out <S%H3318><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the east <S%H6930><s%> country, <S%H1552><s%> and go down <S%H3381><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> the desert, <S%H6160><s%> and go into <S%H935><s%> the sea: <S%H3220><s%> which being brought forth <S%H3318><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall be healed. <S%H7495><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that every <S%H3605><s%> thing <S%H5315><s%> that liveth, <S%H2416><s%> which <S%H834><s%> moveth, <S%H8317><s%> whithersoever <S%H413><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the rivers <S%H5158><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> shall live: <S%H2421><s%> and there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> multitude of fish, <S%H1710><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> these <S%H428><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> thither: <S%H8033><s%> for they shall be healed; <S%H7495><s%> and every thing <S%H3605><s%> shall live <S%H2416><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> cometh. <S%H935><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that the fishers <S%H1728><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it from En-gedi <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5872><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> Eneglaim; <S%H5882><s%> they shall be <S%H1961><s%> a place to spread forth <S%H4894><s%> nets; <S%H2764><s%> their fish <S%H1710><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> according to their kinds, <S%H4327><s%> as the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> exceeding <S%H3966><s%> many. <S%H7227><s%>
But the miry places <S%H1207><s%> thereof and the marshes <S%H1360><s%> thereof shall not <S%H3808><s%> be healed; <S%H7495><s%> they shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to salt. <S%H4417><s%>

And by <S%H5921><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the bank <S%H8193><s%> thereof, on this side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and on that side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> shall grow <S%H5927><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> for meat, <S%H3978><s%> whose leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> fade, <S%H5034><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof be consumed: <S%H8552><s%> it shall bring forth new fruit <S%H1069><s%> according to his months, <S%H2320><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> their waters <S%H4325><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> issued out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof shall be <S%H1961><s%> for meat, <S%H3978><s%> and the leaf <S%H5929><s%> thereof for medicine. <S%H8644><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> This <S%H1454><s%> shall be the border, <S%H1366><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> ye shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall have two portions. <S%H2256><s%>

And ye shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> it, one <S%H376><s%> as well as another: <S%H251><s%> concerning the which <S%H834><s%> I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it unto your fathers: <S%H1><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> unto you for inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> shall be the border <S%H1366><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of Hethlon, <S%H2855><s%> as men go <S%H935><s%> to Zedad; <S%H6657><s%>

Hamath, <S%H2574><s%> Berothah, <S%H1268><s%> Sibraim, <S%H5453><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is between <S%H996><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hamath; <S%H2574><s%> Hazarhatticon, <S%H2694><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H413><s%> the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Hauran. <S%H2362><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> Hazar-enan, <S%H2703><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus, <S%H1834><s%> and the north <S%H6828><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hamath. <S%H2574><s%> And this is the north <S%H6828><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>

And the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> ye shall measure <S%H4058><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> Hauran, <S%H2362><s%> and from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> Damascus, <S%H1834><s%> and from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> from the border <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1366><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the east <S%H6931><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%> And this is the east <S%H6921><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>

And the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward, <S%H8486><s%> from Tamar <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8559><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of strife <S%H4809><s%> in Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%> And this is the south <S%H8486><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward. <S%H5045><s%>

The west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> also shall be the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> from the border, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1366><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> a man come <S%H935><s%> over against <S%H5227><s%> Hamath. <S%H2574><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the west <S%H3220><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>
So shall ye divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> unto you according to the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that ye shall divide it by lot <S%H5307><s%> <S%H853><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto you, and to the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, which <S%H834><s%> shall beget <S%H3205><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you: and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto you as born in the country <S%H249><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> they shall have <S%H5307><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you among <S%H8432><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that in what <S%H834><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> the stranger <S%H1616><s%> sojourneth, <S%H1481><s%> there <S%H854><s%> <S%H8033><s%> shall ye give <S%H5414><s%> him his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
